portfolio.title: School ERP
portfolio.description: An ERP system built in Django for schools to manage marks, homework, notices, attendance, fees, student & employee registration. Separate dashboard for students, teachers and administrator.

portfolio.title: Sknox Website
portfolio.description: Implementation of Skynox website built in my current internship, built with NextJS(React Framework)

portfolio.title: MERN Blog
portfolio.description: A blog website wherein Users can submit blog posts and view blogs written by other users in their feed.Once signed in Users can comment & like each blog. Built using ReactJS at front-end & NodeJS at the back-end and deployed to Heroku.

duty:
Work on NextJS react framework, integrating design and third-party apps 
according to web development plans.

Test site compatibility across multiple browsers and devices, uncovering and debugging issues 
and addressing inconsistencies.

Developed an ERP system from scratch with Django, PostgreSQL & Bootstrap and deployed on 
Heroku for daily analysis.

Added PDF generation, Excel manipulation and image compression features using various 
python packages
Built new user-facing features, design, and fixed flaws for existing projects.
Developed python projects & automated tools and wrote guide for the same.
Wrote python articles and algorithms on operating system concepts (threads and semaphores).
